title: Nursing Research Foundation Education Applying Animation-Based Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of nursing concepts and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning using animation in smartphone-centric learning environments, with step-by-step approaches to resolve complex nursing research terminology

learning_goals: Learners can explain 20 core terms in nursing research with over 80% accuracy using animated materials
Learners can solve research design problems in collaborative learning groups and submit team presentations with 90% completeness
Learners can reconstruct and describe at least three key concepts of the research process in their own words through reflective writing

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
